mapper.select: SELECT S.S_CD, MI.NAME, GR.GR, S.H_PAY, SA.EXP_YN, TO_DATE(S.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MI.SSN2, 1, 1) IN ('1', '3') THEN '남' WHEN SUBSTR(MI.SSN2, 1, 1) IN ('2', '4') THEN '여' ELSE '확인필요' END AS GENDER , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MI.SSN2, 1, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - (1899 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MI.SSN1, 1, 2))) WHEN SUBSTR(MI.SSN2, 1, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - (1999 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MI.SSN1, 1, 2))) ELSE -1 END AS AGE FROM S, RES R, S_APPLY SA, MEM M, MEM_INFO MI, GR WHERE M.MEM_CD = MI.MEM_CD AND M.MEM_CD = SA.MEM_CD AND SA.S_APPLY_CD = R.S_APPLY_CD AND S.RES_CD = R.RES_CD AND S.GR_CD = GR.GR_CD AND M.MEM_CD=#{memCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PERFORM_COUNT FROM PETSITTING_APPLY PA, PERFORM P WHERE PA.SITTING_APPLY_CD = P.SITTING_APPLY_CD AND PA.S_CD = #{sCd}

SELECT NVL(TRUNC(AVG(S.RATING), 1), 0) AS RATING_AVG FROM PETSITTING_APPLY PA, PERFORM P, S_REVIEW S WHERE PA.SITTING_APPLY_CD = P.SITTING_APPLY_CD AND P.PERFORM_CD = S.PERFORM_CD AND PA.S_CD = #{sCd}
SELECT Z.SIZ AS SIZ_NAME FROM S, CRB_SIZE CS, SIZ Z WHERE S.S_CD = CS.S_CD AND CS.SIZ_CD = Z.SIZ_CD AND S.S_CD = #{sCd}
SELECT W.WEEK AS WEEK_NAME FROM S, WORK_DAY WD, WEEK W WHERE S.S_CD = WD.S_CD AND WD.WEEK_CD = W.WEEK_CD AND S.S_CD = #{sCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS APPLY_COUNT FROM S, PETSITTING_APPLY PA, PETSITTING_REQ PR WHERE S.S_CD = PA.S_CD AND PA.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD AND PR.WORK_DATE-1 > SYSDATE AND S.S_CD=#{sCd}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MATCHING_COUNT FROM S, PETSITTING_APPLY PA, PETSITTING_REQ PR, PERFORM P WHERE S.S_CD = PA.S_CD AND PA.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD AND PA.SITTING_APPLY_CD = P.SITTING_APPLY_CD AND PR.WORK_DATE > SYSDATE AND S.S_CD=#{sCd}

SELECT NVL(SUM(P.PERFORM_MONEY),0) AS MONTH_ACC_PAY FROM S, PETSITTING_APPLY PA, PETSITTING_REQ PR, PERFORM P WHERE S.S_CD = PA.S_CD AND PA.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD AND PA.SITTING_APPLY_CD = P.SITTING_APPLY_CD AND PR.WORK_DATE < SYSDATE AND TO_CHAR(PR.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(PR.WORK_DATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND S.S_CD=#{sCd}

SELECT RO.RS_OMR_CD, RO.OMR_CD, RO.SCORE, O.OMR_DATE AS RS_OMR_DATE , CASE WHEN RO.SCORE < 80 THEN '불합격' ELSE '합격' END AS PF FROM S, TTP T, OMR O, RS_OMR RO WHERE S.S_CD = T.S_CD AND T.TTP_CD = O.TTP_CD AND O.OMR_CD = RO.OMR_CD AND RS_OMR_DATE = (SELECT MAX(RO.RS_OMR_DATE) FROM S, TTP T, OMR O, RS_OMR RO WHERE S.S_CD = T.S_CD AND T.TTP_CD = O.TTP_CD AND O.OMR_CD = RO.OMR_CD AND S.S_CD=#{sCd}) AND S.S_CD=#{sCd}
